title: A Little Mood for Love
overview: Wang Sumin raised his two daughters Liu Xiaomin and Liu Xiaojie alone, but they did not expect their daughters to divorce after their 30s. The eldest daughter Liu Xiaomin came to Beijing to work hard because of her husband's cheating. She met Chen Zhuo who was also divorced. The second daughter, Liu Xiaojie, was confused when she got married. She divorced her husband due to a disagreeable personality. She didn't want to remarry but met Xu Zheng, a young talent, and was pursued seriously by the man. Under the guidance of their mother, Liu Xiaomin and Liu Xiaojie used love and tolerance to solve the problems in their relationship, and finally found happiness in life and harvested growth.
